title: Other Resources II
name: Other Resources II
description:
A Map by P2ric

This map contains information regarding various resources gathererd by Terry Grogan.

properties.name: CO2 Emmission Calculators
properties.description: Posted by P2ric10 G Street, Washington, D.C. 20002Andy Bray of NEWMOA shared a series of CO2 emission calculators for specific sectors and cross-sector activities put out by the Greenhouse Gas Protocol Initiative.

properties.name: National P2 Results Data System
properties.description: Posted by P2ric129 Portland St., Boston, MA 02114-2014 The System is comprised of 8 Measurement Modules hosted by P2Rx centers across the nation. It will be used as a repository for pollution prevention measurement data (including activity measures, behavioral measures, and outcome measures), and data will be aggregated nationally to demonstrate the impact of P2.

properties.name: Online Resources for measuring Pollution Prevention
properties.description: Posted by P2ric1200 Pennsylvania Ave Washington, DC 20460On-Line Calculators, Tools, and Resources that Measure, Track, and Evaluate Pollution Prevention Activities.

properties.name: P2RX Topic Hubs
properties.description: Posted by P2ric129 Portland St., Boston, MA 02114-2014 Here are references to a number of software and electronic tools.

properties.name: P2Rx Topic Hub for Environmental Measurement
properties.description: Posted by P2ric513 First Avenue West Seattle Washington 98119There\'s a good discussion of data collection at the P2Rx Topic Hub for Environmental Measurement, managed by PPRC. It has a nice step-wise approach for measurement, and a wonderful list of resources.

properties.name: PPRC Calculators
properties.description: Posted by P2ric513 First Avenue West Seattle, WA 98119A set of calculators developed by the Pacific Northwest Pollution Prevention Resource Exchange (PPRC) which enable the user to estimate the cost savings created by implementing P2 activities.
